alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 1:19PM CST until February 07 at 7:07PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant affecting Elmore and Montgomery Counties. .Flooding continues on the Tallapoosa River Basin near the Tallapoosa Water Plant and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by late tonight, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallapoosa River At The Tallapoosa Water Plant. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Lower Wetumpka Road starts to flood. Extensive flooding of low lands occurs and livestock and farm equipment should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 28.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 PM CST Sunday was 28.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 16.1 feet by early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
